description:
As a customer with items in my cart
  I want to complete the checkout process
  So that I can purchase my selected items

steps.name: I am logged in as "standard_user"
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click the "Checkout" button
I should be on the checkout information page
I should see form fields for First Name, Last Name, and Postal Code
I enter "John" in the First Name field
I enter "Doe" in the Last Name field
I enter "SW1A 1AA" in the Postal Code field
I click the "Continue" button
I should be on the checkout overview page
I should see my order summary
I click the "Finish" button
I should see "Thank you for your order!"
my cart should be empty
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click the "Checkout" button
I am on the checkout information page
I leave the First Name field empty
I enter "Doe" in the Last Name field
I enter "SW1A 1AA" in the Postal Code field
I click the "Continue" button
I should see an error message "Error: First Name is required"
I should remain on the checkout information page
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click the "Checkout" button
I am on the checkout information page
I enter "John" in the First Name field
I leave the Last Name field empty
I enter "SW1A 1AA" in the Postal Code field
I click the "Continue" button
I should see an error message "Error: Last Name is required"
I should remain on the checkout information page
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click the "Checkout" button
I am on the checkout information page
I enter "John" in the First Name field
I enter "Doe" in the Last Name field
I leave the Postal Code field empty
I click the "Continue" button
I should see an error message "Error: Postal Code is required"
I should remain on the checkout information page
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click the "Checkout" button
I should be on the checkout information page
I click the "Cancel" button
I should be redirected to the cart page
I should see "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart
the shopping cart badge should show "1"
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I am on the cart page
I click the "Checkout" button
I enter "John" in the First Name field
I enter "Doe" in the Last Name field
I enter "SW1A 1AA" in the Postal Code field
I click the "Continue" button
I should be on the checkout overview page
I should see "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the order summary
I should see the item price "$29.99"
I should see secure payment information
I should see delivery information
all financial calculations should be accurate

name: Checkout Process

description:
As a customer
  I want to log into the application
  So that I can access the shopping functionality

steps.name: I am on the SauceDemo login page
I enter username "standard_user"
I enter password "secret_sauce"
I click the login button
I should be redirected to the products page
I should see the shopping cart icon
I should see the hamburger menu
I am on the SauceDemo login page
I enter username "invalid_user"
I enter password "secret_sauce"
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"
I should remain on the login page
I am on the SauceDemo login page
I leave username field empty
I enter password "secret_sauce"
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"
I should remain on the login page
I am on the SauceDemo login page
I enter username "standard_user"
I leave password field empty
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Password is required"
I should remain on the login page
I am on the SauceDemo login page
I enter username "locked_out_user"
I enter password "secret_sauce"
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out."
I should remain on the login page

name: User Authentication

description:
As a logged-in customer
  I want to manage items in my shopping cart
  So that I can control what I purchase

steps.name: I am logged in as "standard_user"
I am on the products page
I click "Add to cart" for "Sauce Labs Backpack"
the button text should change to "Remove"
the shopping cart badge should show "1"
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I am on the products page
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I click on the shopping cart icon
I should be on the cart page
I should see "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart
I should see the price "$29.99"
I should see a "Remove" button for the item
I should see a "Continue Shopping" button
I should see a "Checkout" button
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I am on the products page
I have added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I click on the shopping cart icon
I click "Continue Shopping"
I should be redirected to the products page
my cart contents should be preserved
I am logged in as "standard_user"
I am on the products page
I add "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
I add "Sauce Labs Bike Light" to my cart
the shopping cart badge should show "2"
I navigate to the cart page
both items should be listed correctly

name: Shopping Cart Management
